org.agilewiki.jactor2.util

Class JASemaphore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.ActorBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.JASemaphore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class JASemaphore
extends ActorBase
    Blocks request processing, not threads.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JASemaphore

        public JASemaphore(MessageProcessor mbox,
           int permitCount)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a semaphore manager.
        Parameters:
        mbox - The processing used to handle requests.
        permitCount - The number of semaphores initially available.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • acquireReq

        public AsyncRequest<java.lang.Void> acquireReq()
        A request to acquire a semaphore. The release pends until a semaphore is available.
        Returns:
        The request.

      • release

        public void release()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        A request to release a request. If there is a pending request, a release will allow that request to complete.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
